description:
Hanai volunteers his class to help Yakumo clean the school swimming pool, but work quickly turns to play when Harima inadvertently starts a hockey match! What’s that kid doing with a camera?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Altaan puhdistus! / Mellakka altaassa! / Sota altaassa!
Pool Cleaning! / Pool Racing! / Pool Warring!
Pool de Seisou! / Pool de Bousou! / Pool de Sensou!
Reinigung im Pool! Rowdy im Pool! Rumble im Pool!
プールで清掃! / プールで暴走! / プールで戦争!
